about_the_game:
As always... a brave hero figthing with hoards of monsters to rescue a poor princess and kill the mighty dragon. But have I ever told you the whole story? The story that mentions fighting with... curling? The various items to collect, the powerful relics that change how you play, all the fancy characters who waited to be met, and all the unexpected events along the way!

There can't be a better way to experience this journey than by yourself!

Gameplay and features


In this interesting take on a turn-based roguelite, you will explore dungeons in order to try to reach the end. Each time you'll die, you will start from the beginning, but with new experiences and some received benefits. Tons of items, relics and NPCs will help you along the way. On the other side, dangerous enemies will do anything they can to stop you!

Fight with tough monsters and enemies



Collect tens of items and powerfull relics



Explore dungeons within multiple locations

name: Curling in the Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: The princess must be rescued and the mighty dragon killed! You're the perfect candidate, here is your sword, shield and... curling stones? Nevermind, there's no time to lose! Countless of enemies, items, powerfull relics, fancy characters and unexpected events are waiting in the dungeon!
